verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, friends sing, of the faith that’s so dear to me, Revealed thro’ God’s Son, in Galilee; He brought peace on earth and good will to the sons of men, Go tell it to the world, her King reigns again.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I am so happy in Jesus, Captivity’s Captor is He; Angels rejoice when a soul’s saved, Some day we like Him shall be, Sorrow and joy have the same Lord, Valley of shadows shall sing; Death has its life, its door opens in heaven eternally, Christ is King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Crucified, thus He suffered and bled for me, Death and the grave won sin’s victory; Then the sky grew dark and the temple veil rent in twain, Rocks rent, and angels came, for He lived again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: At His feet, on old Olivet’s Hill, they say, Cloud chariots halted, took Christ away; Then the angels came and to wond’ring disciples said He’ll come, and earth and sea shall yield up their dead.
